thread.section_title: Chewy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chewy.com | chewy.com | 2 of 320
thread.title: Laura Balside

author: Laura Balside
title: Laura Balside
text: I read an article on Facebook about a lady who's dog died and Chewy.com sent her a sympathy card. That made me look at this company and decide to give it a try. I ordered cat food and other items for my cat yesterday January 31, 2017. I was absolutely amazed when I looked out my window, today 2/1/2017 to see FedX making the delivery. Haven't had time to open the box but fairly confident everything will be fine. If not I'll be back and let you know.
